String.string: If we fail, the world will die with us.
You've given the families of those lost on this island a great giftâ€”the gift of solace.
Kill runekeepers and destroyers on your way to the shrine.
Found the Entrance to Karascha's Lair.
Find the {@linkcreature:213#1015$$Entrance to Karascha's Lair} in the northwest of the Tainted Gorge Outpost.
Use the {@linkcreature:213#1015$$Teleportal} to enter Karascha's Lair.
Karascha dropped a scroll. Use the {@linkcreature:436#1501#exit teleportal} to leave Karascha's Lair and bring it to Sersine.
Use the Tower Base teleport scroll to return to the Tower Base and speak with Adria.
